dcterms:creator: R. Daluiso
M. Pinciroli
M. Trapletti
E. Vittori
dcterms:description: A dataset used for studying the dynamic risk management of the risk-neutral value of potential credit losses on a portfolio of derivatives, specifically focusing on CVA hedging with reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: CVA Hedging Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Jhuang

dcterms:description: A dataset used for understanding action recognition, which may be relevant for analyzing financial actions in trading contexts.
dcterms:title: FX Rate Dataset

dcterms:creator: J.C. Cox
J.E. Ingersoll
S.A. Ross
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a theoretical framework for the term structure of interest rates, which is essential for understanding default intensities in financial models.
dcterms:title: Default Intensity Dataset

dcterms:creator: International Swaps and Derivatives Association
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides standard model documentation for Credit Default Swaps, which are crucial for managing counterparty risk in financial transactions.
dcterms:title: Credit Default Swaps Dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Bisi
P. Liotet
L. Sabbioni
G. Reho
N. Montali
M. Restelli
C. Corno
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on foreign exchange trading using a risk-averse batch reinforcement learning approach, which is relevant for developing hedging strategies.
dcterms:title: Risk-Averse Reinforcement Learning Dataset
